article.title: Status and history for [011]
article.para: See the Github repository for issues and changes in 2023 and after.
article.history-entry: Language is likely some variant of Umbundu (iso639 umb). Thanks to Michael Cysouw and Philippe Verdy.

history.history-entry: stage 4: http://gddc.pt/direitos-humanos/50anos-decl-univ-dh/UMBUNDO.html identified as the source. XML contributed by Eric Muller.
